item.title: Service
item.description: Track Chair Software Systems, Models and Architectures at the 8th IEEE International Conference on Future Internet of Things and Cloud (FiCloud 2020), Rome, Italy. August 2020. Software Systems, Models and Architectures at the 7th IEEE International Conference on Future Internet of Things and Cloud (FiCloud 2019), Istanbul, Turkey. August 2019. Program Committee The 2020 International Conference on Smart Transportation and Future Mobility (CSTFM 2020), October 2020. Future Internet Services and Applications track, the 29th IEEE WETICE Conference, June 2020.

item.title: Team
item.description: Along with the permanent members of MiMove@Inria and Lisite@Isep, and all my scientific collaborators, I work or have worked with: PhD students Shufan Jiang, Isep Paris and University of Reims. October 2019 - William Aboucaya, Inria Paris. October 2019 - Grigorios Piperagkas, Inria Paris. October 2018 - Postdoctoral Researchers Ehsan Ahvar, Inria Paris. Postdoc. July 2017 - June 2018. Shohreh Ahvar, Inria Paris. Postdoc. July 2017 - December 2018.

item.title: Events & Talks
item.description: Organization. Le numérique au service de la démocracie. Chaire Isep - Institut Catholique de Paris “Citoyenneté et Numérique”. 25 March 2020. Civic Tech@AI Isep conference series (Slides in French). 13 June 2019. Coach & Organization. #FrHack! Le Hackathon des fréquences. In collaboration with Agence Nationale des Fréquences (ANFR). 25-26 May 2019. Coach & Jury. AI Hackathon - Marketing and Environment challenges. 29-31 Mars 2019. Coach & Jury & Local organization.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Before joining Isep, I taught several Computer Science courses at undergraduate and graduate levels since 2004 at Simon Bolivar University, Andres Bello Catholic University, Paris-Dauphine University and Nanterre University, and participated in a MOOC about citizen participation and Civic Tech. I also teach a joint course with the Catholic University of Paris and participated in the French national programme to train high-school teachers to teach Computer Science.
